snippet: Mario Cárdenas Guillén, a presumed top leader of one of the country’s largest and most powerful criminal groups, was caught by the Mexican Navy on Monday as he was carrying a large gun.
abstract: Mexican Navy arrests Mario Cardenas Guillen, the presumed top leader of the Gulf Cartel, one of the country’s largest and most powerful criminal groups.
lead_paragraph: Mario Cárdenas Guillén, a presumed top leader of one of the country’s largest and most powerful criminal groups, was caught by the Mexican Navy on Monday as he was carrying a large gun.

headline.seo: Major Drug Suspect Is Arrested in Mexico
headline.main: Mexico: Major Drug Suspect Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Major Drug Suspect Is Arrested
